subject: Order status
description_text:
﻿Hi. Can I get any updates regarding my order #SSN5393? Estimated shipping date or something?
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Ukolov,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.
